cam72cam.mod.block.entity

Class CustomBlockEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • cam72cam.mod.block.entity.CustomBlockEntity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CustomBlockEntityTickable

    public abstract class CustomBlockEntity
extends java.lang.Object
    Block entity is the building block for more functional blocks in game. It allows you to save complex data and expose certain capabilities (Fluid/Item/Energy/etc...).

    • Field Summary

      TileEntity internal
      Wraps the minecraft construct, do not use directly.

      • onPick

        public abstract ItemStack onPick()
        Called when a player performs the pick operation on this block.
        Returns:
        An ItemStack representing this block. Must NOT be null, return ItemStack.EMPTY instead.
